title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 603.2 - Jurisdiction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 603.2 - Jurisdiction

State Regulations

The commission may be appealed to to fix rates and charges
for water only after the proper authorities of the two municipalities or other
civil divisions of the State have failed to agree as to such rates and charges. The fact of the failure of such negotiations must be set up in the
petition. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
603.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
